overview:
Panos Meyer is a co-founder of Seat 4a, a service which brings the jetset back into flying.

Previously, he was the managing director of deutsche golf online, a company running Europe’s biggest golf website golf.de and mygolf.de. In parallel Panos was CEO of Sporthouse.de AG, an international financial holding investing in sport websites and backend infrastructure. Panos has a backround in product management and marketing. He worked for one of the biggest business and telecommunication infrastructure providers Interoute and was running the european SME business. Before that he worked for two cable operators (Unitymedia and Primacom) and build germany’s first broadband portal in 1999.

milestones.description: Co-Founder of Seat4a GmbH & Co. KG
